sentences.sContent: You need to touch up the poem.
sentences.sContent_eng: You need to touch up the poem.
sentences.sCn: 你需要给这首诗润色一下。

sentences.sContent: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.sContent_eng: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.sCn: 这首诗在当时十分流行。

sentences.sContent: His poem compares poorly with yours.
sentences.sCn: 他的诗做得不如你的好。

trans.tranOther: a piece of writing that expresses emotions, experiences, and ideas, especially in short lines using words that  rhyme (= end with the same sound )
